Title: Relates to the justice center for the protection of people with special needs
Summary: Relates to special prosecutors and sworn investigators employed by the justice center for the protection of people with special needs.
LawCode: Amd §552, Exec L; amd §§700 & 702, County L; amd §1.20, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the county law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to the justice center for the protection of people with special needs and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
